titleStmt.title: A guide to devotion: or, The penitent souls dayly practice. Containing, godly prayers for several occasions; with heavenly meditations, and graces before and after meat. : Together with a short catechism for the better instruction in the Christian religion. Also the holy sayings of several of the ancient fathers of the primitive church. : Very profitable for all people, and useful for families.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for I. Back, at the Black-Boy on London-Bridge ...,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Imperfect: bottom edge of t.p. mutilated, with loss of print; tight binding, with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in: Christ Church (University of Oxford). Library.
